meanings.sent1: The transcribers worked diligently to type out the recorded speech.
meanings.sent2: The transcribers at the office are skilled at converting audio to text.
meanings.sent3: The transcribers had a race to see who could type the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The transcribers' fingers danced across the keyboard, turning speech into text.
meanings.sent5: The transcribers meticulously converted the spoken words into written form.

meanings.definition: A machine or device that transcribes
meanings.sent1: The transcribers in the library efficiently converted the audio to text.
meanings.sent2: The transcribers, like the one in the office, are essential for converting speech to text.
meanings.sent3: The transcribers in the lab had a glitch and started typing random characters.
meanings.sent4: The transcribers hummed softly as they transformed the spoken words into written text.
meanings.sent5: The transcribers whirred as they transcribed the audio into readable text.

meanings.definition: The act or process of transcribing
meanings.sent1: The transcribers' job involves converting spoken words into written text.
meanings.sent2: Transcribers play a crucial role in converting audio to text accurately.
meanings.sent3: The transcribers' meeting turned into a competition of who could type the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The transcribers of history capture the essence of the past in their writings.
meanings.sent5: The transcribers meticulously transcribed the ancient manuscript for preservation.
